de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers

Interface Visualization

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHistogramVisualization, AbstractOPTICSVisualization, AbstractParallelVisualization, AbstractScatterplotVisualization, AbstractTooltipVisualization, AbstractVisualization, AxisVisualization, BubbleVisualization, CircleSegmentsVisualizer, ClusterHullVisualization, ClusterMeanVisualization, ClusterOrderVisualization, ClusterOutlineVisualization, ClusterParallelMeanVisualization, ColoredHistogramVisualizer, DensityEstimationOverlay, EMClusterVisualization, KeyVisualization, LineVisualization, MarkerVisualization, MoveObjectsToolVisualization, OPTICSClusterVisualization, OPTICSPlotCutVisualization, OPTICSPlotSelectionVisualization, OPTICSPlotVisualizer, OPTICSSteepAreaVisualization, ParallelAxisVisualization, PixmapVisualizer, PolygonVisualization, ReferencePointsVisualization, RTreeParallelVisualization, SelectionAxisRangeVisualization, SelectionConvexHullVisualization, SelectionCubeVisualization, SelectionDotVisualization, SelectionLineVisualization, SelectionToolAxisRangeVisualization, SelectionToolCubeVisualization, SelectionToolDotVisualization, SelectionToolLineVisualization, SimilarityMatrixVisualizer, StaticVisualization, ThumbnailVisualization, ToolBox2DVisualization, TooltipScoreVisualization, TooltipStringVisualization, TreeMBRVisualization, TreeSphereVisualization, VoronoiVisualization

    public interface Visualization
    Base class for a materialized Visualization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroy the visualization.
      Element getLayer()
      Get the SVG layer of the given visualization.

    • Method Detail

      • getLayer

        Element getLayer()
        Get the SVG layer of the given visualization.
        Returns:
        layer

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroy the visualization. Called after the elements have been removed from the document. Implementations should remove their listeners etc.
